segments.text: What is the highest goal of your company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The supreme goal of ours is to be in the leadership in marketing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it is a really high target .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We can make great efforts to make it become true as long as we have a clear goal .
segments.speaker: S2
